attributes.comment:
The fee increases are unjust and clearly designed to limit immigrant's ability
to document status & to become citizens. This policy is directly opposed to the
American value of fairness & to the principle that the U.S. is a nation of
immigrants. It is shameful that USCIS is attempting to earn money from the
poorest persons who come to fulfill the American dream and to limit even further
person's ability to become citizens: we should be encouraging, not
discouraging, immigrants to become full participating citizens of the U.S.
Moreover, this very process for persons to comment seems designed to exclude the
participation of many people, especially the illiterate or new immigrants with
limited English or limited computer skills. There should be a number which
persons could call to give their comments: this comment process is undemocratic
and has built in mechanism for those most affected to be least likely to have input.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cristina M. Rebeil
